Tutorials.title: Tutorials
Tutorials.subtitle: Learn Kortix
Tutorials.description: Step-by-step interactive tutorials to help you get the most out of Kortix. From getting started to advanced workflows, master every feature.
Tutorials.checkBack: We're always adding new tutorials to help you get the most out of Kortix. Check back regularly for fresh content and tips.

intro.title: Introduction to Kortix
intro.desc: Get a comprehensive overview of Kortix and discover the different AI-powered content generation modes available to supercharge your workflow.

first_task.title: Getting Started: Your First Task
first_task.desc: Learn the basics of creating and completing your first task with Kortix. This tutorial walks you through the essential workflow to get you productive right away.

presentations.title: How to Create and Export Presentations
presentations.desc: Discover how to create stunning presentations with Kortix and export them in various formats for sharing and presenting.

manage_files.title: How to Create and Manage Files with Kortix
manage_files.desc: Learn how to create, organize, and manage files with Kortix. This tutorial covers downloading data, exporting to different formats like Excel, and more.

media.title: Create Videos and Images
media.desc: Explore the powerful media creation capabilities of Kortix. Learn how to generate videos and images using AI to enhance your projects.

canvas.title: Use Our Canvas Feature
canvas.desc: Master the Canvas feature to visually design and organize your content. This tutorial shows you how to leverage the canvas for creative workflows.

custom_workers.title: Creating Custom Workers - Manual Configuration
custom_workers.desc: Learn how to set up custom AI assistant workers with manual configuration. Explore integration options and tailor workers to your specific needs.
